member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_EXTENSION
member.summary: Contains driver-specific data for the method.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_EXTENSION.Function
member.summary: The function number. This number identifies the operation to perform. Currently no function numbers are defined.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_EXTENSION.pPrivateInputData
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that contains input data for the driver.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_EXTENSION.PrivateInputDataSize
member.summary: The size of the pPrivateInputData buffer, in bytes.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_EXTENSION.pPrivateOutputData
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that the driver can use to write output data.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_EXTENSION.PrivateOutputDataSize
member.summary: The size of the pPrivateOutputData buffer, in bytes.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_EXTENSION.ResourceCount
member.summary: The number of elements in the ppResourceList array. If ppResourceList is NULL, set ResourceCount to zero.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_EXTENSION.ppResourceList
member.summary: The address of an array of pointers. Use this member to pass Direct3D resources to the driver.
